item.title: ARCS
item.description: Advocates for residential communities and and schools (ARCS) is a local policy group that supports sensible growth. Their action page has useful information.

item.title: newsletter
item.description: Subscribe to a newsletter to learn the latest on any development activity occuring around Creekside Elementary.
